sqlGroup.name: doc
sqlGroup.sql: select m.id, m.name, m.title, m.page, m.cover, m.type_id, m.open_type from main m where m.state=1 and m.type_id=? order by m.order DESC
select dc.id, dc.title,dc.desc,dc.icon from doc_class dc where dc.state=1 and index_show=? order by dc.order DESC

from doc_info doc left join (select count(id) page_count,doc_id from doc_page group by doc_id) dpc on dpc.doc_id=doc.id left join doc_class dc on dc.id=doc.doc_class_id left join sys_users u on u.user_id=doc.user_id left join user_profile up on up.user_id=u.user_id

select doc.id,doc.title,doc.is_end,doc.desc,doc.cover,doc.doc_class_id,dc.title class_title,doc.user_id,doc.source ,up.nick_name,doc.is_ad,dp.page_count,dp.view_count,ifNULL(uf.favor_count,0) favor_count from doc_info doc left join (select count(id) page_count,sum(view_count) view_count, doc_id from doc_page group by doc_id) dp on dp.doc_id=doc.id left join (select count(id) favor_count,data_id from user_favor where type='doc' group by data_id) uf on uf.data_id=doc.id left join doc_class dc on dc.id=doc.doc_class_id left join sys_users u on u.user_id=doc.user_id left join user_profile up on up.user_id=u.user_id where doc.id=?
